text: TUI Group () is a multinational travel and tourism company headquartered in Hannover, Germany. It is the largest leisure, travel and tourism company in the world and owns travel agencies, hotels, airlines, cruise ships and retail stores. The company was founded in 1923. The company is jointly listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange and the London Stock Exchange as a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index. == Other websites == * Official website Category:1923 establishments in Germany Category:Companies of Germany Category:Hanover Category:Tourism companies
title: TUI Group
